bibl.title: The Role of the Book in the Civilisations of the Near East. Proceedings of the Conference held at the Royal Irish Academy and the Chester Beatty Library, Dublin, 29 June-1 July 1988
bibl.note: Previously published as: From Papyrus Roll to Papyrus Codex. Some Technical Aspects = Katholieke Universiteit Leuven. Campus Kortrijk. Preprint Nr. 54 (Kortrijk, 1988). - The quires of P. Chester Beatty Ac. 1499 were made from rolls; a very special fabrication technique ("in concertina fashion") was applied which is as yet unparalleled.
